title: Synthesis of layered double hydroxides: Investigating the impact of stirring conditions and reactor design parameters
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Rafaela Gabriel, Pollyanna Vanessa dos Santos Lins, Felipe de Alcântara Moura Vilela, Sandra Helena Vieira de Carvalho, Rodolfo Junqueira Brandão, João Inácio Soletti, Lucas Meili
